title: The Wrong Stuff
description: Valerie has reservations about the influence Michael's old Army buddy, Skip, has on the family when he comes for a visit. That concern is well founded when Willie starts using profanity around the house.

title: Caught on a Hot Tin Roof
Leave It to Willie
description: Willie learns a tough lesson about the difference between television and reality when he takes the family car for a joy ride, causes a hit-and-run accident and allows David to take the blame. When David tells Willie he is aware what's going on, Willie imagines a "happy ending in 30-minutes"-type resolution to his predicament. However, Valerie is outraged when Willie decides to finally come clean and grounds him from attending a party he was looking forward to.

title: Burned Out
description: An electrical short in an old lamp stored in the attic causes a house fire that seriously damages the Hogan home. The fire renews the family's grief over Valerie's recent death, compounded when David finds a charred picture of his mother on what used to be his nightstand. But when Mark and Willie complain over maybe being out of their home for weeks, David's devotional speech gives everyone a reason to be thankful.

title: Skip III: The Bailout
description: Michael's buddy Skip returns, offering to take him and David on a plane ride. But things turn deadly serious when the plane begins developing engine trouble and everyone is forced to bail out.

title: Help Wanted
description: David recommends hiring a scatterbrained but beautiful blonde named Melanie as the Hogans' temporary housekeeper - with the predictable bad result.

title: Animal House
description: David and two of his college friends decide to steal a rival school's mascot before the game next weekend. Mark and Willie decide to put Sandy's details into a computer-dating organisation after she had a bad dating experience.

title: Hair Today, Gone Tomorrow
description: Michael has been selected to redo his driver's licence test. He fails the test and has to redo the examination. David plays a practical joke on Mark and Willie and they get back at him by convincing him that his hair is falling out.

title: Dad's First Date
description: David has to forgo a camping holiday because he has to finish a paper by Monday but spends most of the time avoiding it. Mark is nervous about his first date and apprehensive about how it'll go. It goes badly and from disaster to disaster.

title: Save Baby Mark
description: Sandy and Michael visit their elderly aunt Mildred to convince her to move down to Florida to be with her daughter. The boys are cleaning the chimney when Dave manages to get Mark stuck in it. The fire brigade is called to get him out.

title: Saturday Night Feverish
description: Mark is in love with a girl at school, but how to meet her? Michael suggests that he have a party and invite her. When she said that she liked to dance, Willie says Mark is a terrific dancer, which causes him a problem as he can't dance.

title: Tobacco Road
description: When Willie is caught smoking at school, Sandy convinces him that he shouldn't start. She smoked in college and pointed out that it is an addiction very hard to break. However, she takes up smoking again to help her cope for an exam.

title: The Big Sleep
description: David tries to conduct a psychological experiment on Mark to see the effects of sleep deprivation. Sandy stops it but David convinces Sandy to be the subject instead. The results show that she is no longer the 'queen of the all-nighter'.

title: Secretarial Poole
description: Mrs. Poole volunteers to fill in for Sandy's secretary. Mark and Willie are in trouble and Michael thinks it is caused by boy they are keeping company with. Michael and Sandy meet the boy's mother, who is initially disinterested.

title: Strangers on a Train
description: It's Martin Luther King Day and one of Sandy's former teachers comes to the Hogan home for dinner. He is from South Africa and talks about apartheid, which shocks his listeners. Will wants to go to a candle light vigil against apartheid.

title: The Naked Truth
description: Mark and Willie are on a school trip when they are astounded to see a nude painting of Sandy in a gallery. The picture was painted by an old college friend of Sandy's and it turns out that the artist put her head on somebody else's body.

title: Rebel with a Cause
description: Mark is not invited to a party with Willie so he decides that he is not cool enough and feels he must change. Sandy's car needs an oil change and, despite her misgivings, she lets Dave do it for her.

title: Boy Meets Girl
description: David has a run in with a pretty girl he didn't know, and he then goes on a blind date with her. The date doesn't go well but he then asks her out. Richard, Sandy's ex, is in town for his aunt's funeral and he is taking it very casually.

title: Boy Loses Girl
description: The relationship between Sara and David has been going very well but then Sara is offered a position at an Australian marine science centre. To stay together, David proposes to her. Sara realises that they aren't ready for marriage.

title: Viva Las Vegas
description: David, Burt and Rich head to Las Vegas for a boxing match but are distracted by the pokies. Burt hits the jackpot with his first coin and they go on a spending spree with the winnings unaware of exactly how much they're spending.

title: Double Date
description: Dave has been reading his psychology texts and decides that he needs to go back to being the boys' older brother again. Michael wants Sandy to go on a blind date and she agrees, as long as he goes on one too, at the same time.

title: The Long Goodbye
description: When Michael chastises David for not coming home one night, David decides that he would be better off living with Burt and Rich. However, when they all get together David finds that the grass is not greener on the other side.

title: Oh Dad, Poor Dad
description: Michael starts wearing reading glasses, which makes him feel old. Sandy then decides to throw Michael a surprise 40th birthday party with the help of the boys, and he doesn't cope well with all the 'getting old' jokes at the party.

title: Slapshot
description: David is threatened by a very competitive hockey player. In their next game David seriously injures him. Willie owes Mark some money for damaging his computer but annoys him when he buys a signed baseball instead.

title: Private Lessons
description: Willie wants Mark to tutor his new girlfriend as she will be sent to a private school if her grades don't improve. Mark is reluctant to but does so, too successfully. David becomes sick, and everybody suffers as he is a hypochondriac.

title: Coming to America
description: Sandy's friend from Italy is coming to America to teach Italian at the boy's school with Sandy. The boys are initially reluctant, until they see how beautiful she is. David, in particular, is very smitten and he can't do enough for her.

title: Paris: Part 1
description: The Hogans head to Paris for a little holiday. David goes to see the city and a girl runs him over with her car. She offers to help him and he finds himself attracted to her. But what he doesn't know is that she's a princess who decides to take a break from her royal duties.

title: Paris: Part 2
description: David is getting more serious about Julia but still doesn't know who she really is. Her body guards are still after her, which leads to some narrow escapes.

title: Paris: Part 3
description: When David doesn't come back after the date with Julia, the boys try to cover for him. Then Julia's guards finally catch up with her and she seemingly disappears from Dave's life. Julia's true identity is finally revealed.

title: The Tracks of My Tears
description: The boys think Sandy's ex is taking advantage of her when he wants her to take care of his untrained dog when he goes away. Willie wants Dave to be his personal trainer for an athletics race coming up but isn't prepared for what is needed.

title: The Rivals
description: Mark and Willie compete for the same girl. The force her to choose and there is one winner and one loser. Dave saves Sandy some money when he buys an exercise bike for her but it need to be assembled, which is not Dave's forte.

title: License to Drive
description: Dave is doing a video class project of a 'typical American family' where he is required to record everything that is happening. Mark is going for his driver's licence but his overconfidence causes him to have an accident.

title: The Hospital
description: Michael has an unsuccessful day fishing using the latest equipment whilst his family has all the success using primitive equipment. Dave and Burt don a camel suit in order to ride on a parade float, but they fall off and are injured.

title: Get a Job
description: The Hogans redo the lounge room floor, which doesn't quite go as planned. Mark gets Willie a job at Bossy Burger. Willie doesn't take it seriously and Mark continually covers for him. However, the boss promotes Willie to assistant manager.

title: Stir Crazy
description: As part of his college course Dave makes an instructional video of Mrs Poole cooking, which the local TV station wants to make a weekly show. Michael is concerned about home security and installs a high-tech alarm system.

title: Educating Rita
description: Dave has trouble trying to sell his mountain bike and he is forced to compromise. A neighbour breaks up with her boyfriend and she turns to Sandy for some advice. Sandy ends up having to be her friend, and she won't leave Sandy alone.

title: Sandy in Love
description: David breaks a tooth on a pistachio nut and he is very apprehensive about going to the dentist. Sandy goes with him and there is an instant attraction between her and the dentist. They go out on a series of dates.

title: Bad Day at Bossy Burger
description: Frank and Sandy are going to be very busy for the next two days so Dave is put in charge. He takes the job very seriously. Mark has a confrontation with the new school bully and has to avoid being beaten up.

title: The Franklin Family
description: An old friend of Michael's suddenly turns up just as Michael is about to go away on a camping trip. The friend is to attend a reunion of his flight school. He needs a date and Dave volunteers Sandy, and she forces Dave to go as well.

title: Forget Me Not
description: Sandy trips over at a baby shower, falls down some stairs and hits her head. This causes her to completely lose her short term memory. Her inability to remember events causes some awkward situations, especially for Dave.

title: The Go-Between
description: Mark is in love with a new girl in his class but she is infatuated with Willie. Willie uses Mark to impress her. Dave is to perform in a charity concert but needs an act. He tries ventriloquism and then magic, both unsuccessfully.

title: Used Car
description: Mrs. Poole is on edge as her mother-in-law is coming to stay for a few days and she gets on everybody's nerves. Dave is eager to buy a new car and sells his old car to Mark and Willie. Unfortunately, it is a lemon.

title: Mutiny on the Bossy
description: Dave is dismayed because Annie is going home for a visit. Mark is promoted to acting manager at Bossy Burger. When the other workers take advantage of him, he goes overboard. Michael tries to fix a power outlet, but the job gets bigger.

title: Crimes and Misdemeanors
description: There is a new neighbour who is a bit mysterious and Dave suspects that he is a criminal. Willie employs Mark to tutor him in biology when Michael is furious about his poor results. When he succeeds the teacher accuses him of cheating.

title: A Matter of Principal
description: Sandy's request for funding for a literacy program is denied so she decides to quit. She writes the letter of resignation but doesn't send it. By the next morning she has had second thoughts, but Dave has already sent the letter.

title: Prom, Lies and Videotape
description: Sandy organises a caterer for the school prom coming up. However, Dave intervenes and causes the caterer to walk away from the job. Willie asks a reluctant Brenda to the prom, which leads to them breaking up after an argument.

title: California Dreamin': Part 1
description: The Hogans are off to California to help cheer up Sandy and Michael's father, who has just gone through a divorce. Whilst there, Mark and Willie become interested in the local girls, and David crashes a film set.

title: California Dreamin': Part 2
description: After the storm, Sandy tries to convince Lloyd to return to live with them in Chicago. Mark gets it into his head that Cara is being unfaithful so he goes on a date with another girl. Dave finally gets fed up with Jennifer's demands .

title: The Baby Stops Here
description: To help out Mrs. Poole for a short time, Sandy looks after her niece, who is baby girl. However, as she has to leave, Sandy passes the baby onto Dave to look after. Dave then tricks Mark and Willie into looking after her.

title: The Play's the Thing
description: Mark challenges Willie to try out for the lead in the school play and, to everybody's surprise, he gets the role. Dave talks Sandy into stop buying so many raffle tickets. Lloyd and Michael start to play golf together.

title: From Russia with Fries
description: Dave's 21st is coming up so Michael gives him a watch that is a Hogan family heirloom and which is given to the eldest male in the family. Unfortunately, he breaks it. A mix up leads to Mark and Willie being sacked from Bossy Burger.

title: Ex Marks the Spot
description: Sandy's ex husband is getting remarried and he asks Dave to be his best man. Sandy is not happy with the situation but goes to the wedding anyway. Lloyd buys Mark and Willie a motorcycle without asking Michael first.

title: Come Fly with Me
description: Dave is having a woman drought so he decides to wear Michael's pilot's uniform. He also uses Michael's name and goes to a bar with Burt with some initial success. Things go wrong when the woman he meets turns up at the Hogan house.

title: It Happened One Night... Or Did It?
description: There's conflict in the video store between Lloyd and Michael. Dave helps Burt run for student body treasurer. Mark and Cara are forced up to his room to study for a test when they fall asleep. Nobody believes nothing happened.

title: The Best of Friends, Worst of Times
description: While filming Mark at his volunteer job at the hospital, David discovers that his best friend, Rich, is dying of AIDS and makes a documentary film of Rich's last months.

title: A Sneaking Suspicion
description: Mark and Willie are desperate for a job. When they hear Dave's new girl friend talking about a job going at a shoe store they hurry to get there before she does. Sandy thinks Mrs Poole is having an affair with a new teacher at her school.

title: Isn't It Romantic?
description: The plumber says that the Hogan house is jinxed because every 20 years the woman of the house is injured. Sandy has a bad day and Dave believes it. Willie and Brenda have a fight, which ends up with him having two dates on the same night.

title: Ho, Ho, Hogans
description: Dave needs to earn some money for a ski trip so he decides to become a Santa Claus at a local mall. It is an eye opener for him and he learns about the real spirit of Christmas. Sandy is looking forward to decorating the Christmas tree, which becomes a bit of a chore. Lloyd is trying to re-institute the old Hogan family Christmas traditions and is facing opposition from the family. Willie and Mark buy the same sweater for their girlfriends and neither wants to take their present back.
